function.name: devin
function.description: Interact with Devin AI to solve programming tasks

prompt.description: The task description for Devin (for create_session)

playbook_id.description: Optional playbook ID to guide execution (for create_session)

message.description: Message to send to Devin (for send_message)

session_id.description: Session ID to interact with (for send_message, get_session_status)

limit.description: Maximum number of sessions to return (for list_sessions)

offset.description: Number of sessions to skip (for list_sessions)

file_path.description: Path to the file to upload (for upload_file)
